name: escvi
description: facebook.tracking.exposed â†’ Esigo Sapere Come Veniamo Informati

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/css dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && mkdir dist/js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-css && cp styles/*.ico dist/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.* dist/css && cp node_modules/d3/d3.min.js dist/js && cp node_modules/c3/c3.min.js dist/js && cp node_modules/c3/c3.css dist/css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js dist/js/ && cp sections/webscripts/*.js dist/js && cp node_modules/lodash/lodash.min.js dist/js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/js/reveal.js dist/js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/css/theme/solarized.css dist/css/reveal-solarized.css && cp node_modules/reveal.js/css/reveal.css dist/css/reveal.css && cp node_modules/reveal.js/lib/js/head.min.js dist/js/reveal-head.min.js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/js/reveal.js dist/js/reveal.min.js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/lib/js/classList.js dist/js/classList.js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/lib/font/league-gothic/* dist/css/ && cp sections/slide-pics/* dist/images # I know I've to use gruntfile.. feel free to PR ;)
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & (DEBUG=api-2,analysis,sharding,staticpages,ESCVI,utils nodemon app -e js,jade)

author: Claudio Agosti <claudio@tacticaltech.org>
